hooks.command: terminal-notifier -title 'Claude Code' -subtitle 'Session Complete' -message "Finished working in $(basename "$PWD")" -sound default -timeout 10

if [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" == *.swift ]]; then swift-format format -i "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" =~ \.(js|ts|jsx|tsx|html|css|json)$ ]]; then npx prettier --write "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
